info.about_company: Activision Blizzard, Inc., a member of the S&P 500, is the world's most successful standalone interactive entertainment company. They delight hundreds of millions of monthly active users around the world through franchises including Activision's Call of Duty®, Destiny and Skylanders®, Blizzard Entertainment's World of Warcraft®, Overwatch®, Hearthstone®, Diablo®, StarCraft®, and Heroes…More
